研究将炎症途径与骨矿物质密度变化联系起来在同类研究的第一项研究之一中，来自USC凯克医学院的一组研究人员发现，涉及炎症的蛋白质和途径随着时间的推移与骨矿物质密度（BMD）的变化有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/study-links-inflammation-pathways-to-changes-to-changes-in-bone-bone-mineral-neral-dentys.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/study-links-inflammation-pathways-pathways-to-changes-in-bone-bone-mineral-denster.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=245614C3-ECF2-452C-BAD3-827596719C96 Fri, 14 Mar 2025 16:33:00 -0400 Study links inflammation pathways to changes in bone mineral density
线粒体可能具有减少衰老细胞炎症的关键在人类和其他多细胞生物中，细胞繁殖。这种定义特征允许胚胎成年，并在此过程中可以治愈许多颠簸，瘀伤和刮擦。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/mitochondria-may-hold-key-to-reducing-inflammaging-inflammaging-ingaging-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/mitochondria-may-hold-key-to-reducing-inflammaging-inflammaging-ingaging-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0cba55589-146b-4197-B551-FD287A4FFA99 Fri, 14 Mar 2025 16:25:00 -0400 Mitochondria may hold key to reducing inflammaging in aging cells
生物能年龄可以预测阿尔茨海默氏病风险Weill Cornell Medicine的新研究显示，一个人的“生物能量年龄” - 他们的细胞产生能量可能是有多么年轻的能量可能是他们是否有患阿尔茨海默氏病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/bioenergetic-age-could-could-predict-alzheimers-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/bioenergetic-age-could-could-predict-predict-alzheimers-disease-risk-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3E45EC68-051F-4B53-9F21-F21-FD5C4283F11B Fri, 14 Mar 2025 16:19:00 -0400 Bioenergetic age could predict Alzheimer's disease risk

长期研究表明，活跃年轻人的最后一生替换根据美国矫形器外科医生学院的领奖台，一项新的研究显示，特殊外科医院（HSS）研究人员的一项研究40年的研究发现，接受总膝盖置换的活跃年轻人不太可能在其一生中进行膝盖置换修订。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/long-term-study-shows-know-knee-knee-replacements-last-last-last-last-liftime-for-active-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/long-term-study-shows-know-knee-knee-replacements-last-last-last-liftime-for-active-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=793169BA-F723-4B98-4B98-AF37-54D50CC976BF Fri, 14 Mar 2025 16:04:00 -0400 Long-term study shows knee replacements last lifetime for active young adults
